flawed_nl_solution:
Mary will inflate a total of 10 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<10*30=300>>300 balloons
Jess will inflate a total of 7 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<7*30=210>>210 balloons
Christina will inflate a total of 4 balloons/minute x 15 minutes = <<4*15=60>>60 balloons
Combining all balloons, they made 300 balloons + 210 balloons + 60 balloons = <<300+210+60=600>>600 balloons
#### 600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 570, not 600. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
